item.title: Law Understand Assistant
item.description: Law Understand Assistant Mission Empower individuals to provide ubiquitous law assistance Problem Law system is complicated and nearly impossible to understand for individuals No affordable system for normal people to get assistance to Most cases share the same structure, while the council takes forever Solution Ubiquitous cheap solution to provide assistance through NLP AI Accessible in multiple channels including all major social networks Conversion to our lawyer work force with high productivity due to AI
